chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
P: (nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)))%type
i: nat
x: pos n
k: nat
v: Vector.t nat n
st: (nat * Vector.t nat n)%type

Goal:
(i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) ->> st -> P // (i, v) ->> st

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_compute_INC : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_INC : forall (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
sss_stall_step_0 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (ii : instr) (P : nat * list instr) (q : nat) (st st' : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_stall one_step ii st -> sss_steps one_step P q st st' -> q = 0 /\ st = st'
Inductive mma_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mma_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mma_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x]) Arguments mma_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mm_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mm_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
mm_sss_INC_inv : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[(S (v#>x))/x]
in_mma_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])
sss_stall_step_stall : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (ii : instr) (P : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_stall one_step ii st -> sss_step_stall one_step P st
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (ii : instr) (st st' : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_step one_step P st st' -> one_step ii st st'
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a : ?A), a ## VectorDef.append v0 w = VectorDef.append (a ## v0) w where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v0) = (a, v0) where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- nat]
mm_state = fun n : nat => (nat * vec nat n)%type : nat -> Set Arguments mm_state _%nat_scope
subcode_cons_inj : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (ρ δ : X) (P : code X), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n st : nat * vec nat n |- Type]
subcode_sss_compute_linstr : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (li : list instr) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 st : nat * data), sss_steps one_step (fst st1, li) k st1 st2 -> (fst st1, li) <sc P -> sss_compute one_step P st2 st -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st
sss_step_stall_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), sss_step_stall one_step P st -> {ii : instr | (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P /\ sss_stall one_step ii st} + {out_code (fst st) P}
in_mm_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])
in_sss_steps_0 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P 0 st st
sss_terminates_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (R : nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, out_code (fst st) P -> R st) -> (forall st1 : nat * data, (forall (Q : code instr) (st2 : nat * data), Q <sc P -> sss_progress one_step Q st1 st2 -> sss_terminates one_step P st2 -> R st2) -> R st1) -> forall st : nat * data, sss_terminates one_step P st -> R st
subcode_sss_terminates : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), P <sc Q -> sss_terminates one_step Q st -> sss_terminates one_step P st
sss_step_supcode : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (st st' : nat * data), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st) P -> sss_step one_step Q st st' -> sss_step one_step P st st'
sss_compute_max_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (R : nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, sss_step_stall one_step P st -> R st st) -> (forall st1 st3 : nat * data, (forall (Q : code instr) (st2 : nat * data), Q <sc P -> sss_progress one_step Q st1 st2 -> sss_compute_max one_step P st2 st3 -> R st2 st3) -> R st1 st3) -> forall st1 st3 : nat * data, sss_compute_max one_step P st1 st3 -> R st1 st3
Inductive sss_steps (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) : nat -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop := in_sss_steps_0 : forall st : nat * data, sss_steps one_step P 0 st st | in_sss_steps_S : forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> sss_steps one_step P (S n) st1 st3 Arguments sss_steps [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_0 [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_S [instr data]%type_scope [one_step]%function_scope [P] [n]%nat_scope [st1 st2 st3]
subcode_sss_terminates_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (st st1 : nat * data), sss_terminates one_step Q st -> P <sc Q -> sss_output one_step P st st1 -> sss_terminates one_step Q st1
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3
code = fun X : Type => (nat * list X)%type : Type -> Type Arguments code _%type_scope
sss_steps_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (P0 : nat -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, P0 0 st st) -> (forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> P0 n st2 st3 -> P0 (S n) st1 st3) -> forall (n : nat) (p p0 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P n p p0 -> P0 n p p0

``` 
intros.
inversion 1. intros. inversion H. intros. apply sscode_progress_dec_0_inv with (x:=x)(k:=k)(v:=v) in H4. destruct H4 as [H4a H4b]. rewrite H4a. rewrite H4b. assumption. 
```

original: intros. inversion 1. intros. inversion H. intros. apply sscode_progress_dec_0_inv with (x:=x)(k:=k)(v:=v) in H4. destruct H4 as [H4a H4b]. rewrite H4a. rewrite H4b. auto.
